// src/pages/Home.js import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Section from "../components/UI/Section"; import SectionDivider from "../components/UI/SectionDivider"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const Home = () => { return (
Taylor-Made {"Baby Planning".split("").map((char, index) => ( {char === " " ? "\u00a0" : char} ))}

A calm, confident path to welcoming your little one. Personalized registries, nursery design, shower planning, and ongoing support‚Äîtailored to your family.

Explore Services Book a Consultation
{[ { icon: "üå∏", label: "Invite-Only", detail: "A discreet client list curated by referral." }, { icon: "ü§ç", label: "White-Glove Concierge", detail: "Taylor personally oversees every decision." }, { icon: "üîê", label: "Confidential Always", detail: "NDA-backed planning and event management." }, ].map(({ icon, label, detail }) => (
{icon}

{label}

{detail}

))}
{/* Public information sections */}

The Problem

Preparing for a baby is supposed to feel exciting ‚Äî but too often it‚Äôs overwhelming. Between endless stroller options, registry decisions, nursery planning, family expectations, and shower details, parents are left feeling stressed instead of supported.

The Solution

Taylor-Made Baby Planning takes the pressure off your shoulders. From personalized registries and gear guidance to nursery design, shower planning, and even smoothing family dynamics, I handle the details so you don‚Äôt have to.

The Benefit

With my Taylor-Made approach, you‚Äôll feel calm, confident, and fully prepared to welcome your little one. Baby prep becomes simple, stress-free, and even fun ‚Äî just the way it should be.

{[ { title: "Registry & Gear Concierge", desc: "Every list curated, managed, and delivered ‚Äî you simply approve the final selections.", icon: "üóíÔ∏è", }, { title: "Personal Shopping", desc: "In-home or virtual consultations, VIP access, and white-glove delivery for every must-have.", icon: "üõçÔ∏è", }, { title: "Nursery & Home Design", desc: "Furniture, safety, and styling planned with your design team for a seamless reveal.", icon: "üõèÔ∏è", }, { title: "Events & Celebrations", desc: "Baby showers, sip-and-sees, and bespoke gifting handled with total discretion.", icon: "ü•Ç", }, { title: "Family Integration", desc: "Support for siblings, pets, and family dynamics so everyone feels considered.", icon: "üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶", }, { title: "Ongoing Concierge", desc: "Fourth-trimester coaching, vetted experts, and beyond-baby planning on standby.", icon: "‚è≥", }, ].map((service) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.desc}

))}
‚ÄúTaylor made our registry feel effortless ‚Äî no stress, no second‚Äëguessing.‚Äù ‚Äî Jenna M.
‚ÄúShe helped us choose a stroller that truly works for our lifestyle. Game‚Äëchanger!‚Äù ‚Äî Rachel & Matt K.
    {[ { step: "1. Private Invite", body: "Membership is invite-only. Once selected, choose the package that fits best: Essentials, Signature, or Bespoke.", }, { step: "2. Confidential Agreement", body: "Every member signs an NDA so all details ‚Äî from registry picks to family dynamics ‚Äî remain private.", }, { step: "3. Concierge Consultation", body: "We begin with a deep-dive consultation, in-home or virtual, to understand your style, lifestyle, and priorities.", }, { step: "4. Curated Planning", body: "Taylor handles everything ‚Äî registry building, gear shopping, nursery design, family prep, and event planning based on your package. You simply approve final selections.", }, { step: "5. Add-On Flexibility", body: "Need more? Add shower planning, extended nursery styling, or postpartum support at member rates.", }, { step: "6. Ongoing Access", body: "Stay connected through the Taylor-Made Blog and Mom Mentor Circle for advice, insider tips, and peer support. You may even be invited to mentor others.", }, { step: "7. Always Discreet", body: "From beginning to end, the experience is confidential, stress-free, and fully tailored to you.", }, ].map(({ step, body }) => (
  1. {step.split(".")[0]}

    {step.split(". ")[1] || step}

    {body}

    2. ))}

Every package unlocks access to an exclusive community experience. Membership is more than support ‚Äî it‚Äôs a private circle curated for families who value discretion, insider insight, and shared wisdom.

{[ { title: "Taylor-Made Blog", points: [ "Private resource hub with curated comparisons, design tips, travel guides, and family dynamic strategies.", "Insider updates on product launches, recalls, and luxury brand drops.", "Seasonal checklists for hospital, holidays, and toddler transitions.", ], icon: "üìí", }, { title: "Taylor-Made Mentors", points: [ "Invitation-only circle of mothers offering lived wisdom and encouragement.", "Personal matching with a mentor who mirrors your lifestyle.", "Opportunities to step into mentorship and extend the legacy of support.", ], icon: "ü§ù", }, ].map((perk) => (
{perk.icon}

{perk.title}

    {perk.points.map((point, index) => (
  • ‚óÜ {point}
    • ))}
))}
üîê

Membership Promise

Every member is welcomed under strict confidentiality agreements and NDAs. Consultations, registries, and events are managed with private oversight so membership always feels like stepping into an exclusive club ‚Äî never just an add-on service.

Hi, I‚Äôm Taylor! Think of me as your go‚Äëto guide (and maybe your new best friend) for all things baby prep. I‚Äôve spent years helping families navigate the overwhelming world of strollers, car seats, nurseries, and registries.

Now, I bring that experience to you in a warm, personalized way that takes away the stress and leaves you excited, prepared, and confident.

); }; export default Home;
